content.raw:
What are the requirements for “solution docker”? Is the “bridge docker” somehow part of the uploaded “solution docker” to AWS or Ignition provides that automatically \(when adding new robot with name of docker\)?

What are expected differences when running locally and on AWS? \(locally it scores 1 point, on AWS it even does not start:

‌

```

```

Thanks again for any hint
